content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was reminded of encountering an error while browsing a website and being advised to retry or contact their help center, with a request ID to include in any messages. In my latest action, I used the "google" command to search for fun things to do in NYC, but the command "get_hyperlinks" returned too much output and failed. I then used the "browse_website" command to ask my computer for suggestions on fun activities to do in NYC. No further developments have occurred.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: There are many fun activities to do in NYC, including visiting museums, dining at various restaurants, attending Broadway shows, experiencing unique activities like roller skating at Rockefeller Center, and visiting landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Other activities include shopping at the world's largest Harry Potter Store, visiting the Museum of Broadway, and exploring Brooklyn Heights and the Promenade. The text provides various lists of fun activities to do in NYC, ranging from 36 to 94 activities. \n \n Links: ['Go to the content (https://www.timeout.com/newyork/things-to-do/101-things-to-do-in-new-york#main-container)', 'Go to the footer (https://www.timeout.com/newyork/things-to-do/101-things-to-do-in-new-york#site-footer)', 'Terms of Use (https://www.timeout.com/terms-of-use)', 'Privacy Policy (https://www.timeout.com/privacy-notice)', 'News (https://www.timeout.com/newyork/news)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "fun_activities_nyc.txt", "text": "There are many fun activities to do in NYC, including visiting museums, dining at various restaurants, attending Broadway shows, experiencing unique activities like roller skating at Rockefeller Center, and visiting landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Other activities include shopping at the world\'s largest Harry Potter Store, visiting the Museum of Broadway, and exploring Brooklyn Heights and the Promenade."}}}'}]
"""
